subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Stan Lee beat Sam Farlow, 4 and 3, to win the U.S.G.A. Senior Amateur in Andover, Kan., five days after his 55th birthday, to become the tournament’s youngest champion. Lee, of Heber Springs, Ark., surpassed the previous record of 55 years 3 months 18 days, set by Bill Bosshard in 1991.
